duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing relationships of trust and respect with customers, relaying pertinent order information, and coordinating lead times with store management/customers.
Responsible for making sales, placing orders, observing competitive products, and checking in all service orders.
Working with store management/customers to resolve issues, maintaining price changes, selling displays, and making orders for assigned territory.
Keeping back stock to a minimum, performing routine maintenance, and stocking and merchandising ordered products.
Building and putting up displays or shippers, including travel for assigned stores and territories.

education_certification.credential: General Equivalency Diploma - General Studies, High School Diploma - General Studies
